#Text=The Orlando Magic defeated the Memphis Grizzlies , 112 - 102 , at Amway Center on Monday .
#Text=While this scoreline looks moderately close , the Magic had this game well in hand early on .
#Text=In fact , they led by 25 points at the half in a rare wire - to - wire win , as it took a 30 - 16 fourth quarter for Memphis to make the scoreline respectable .
#Text=Orlando 's offense was extremely efficient , as they shot 51 percent from the field and 50 percent from three - point range , while committing just nine turnovers and 23 assists .
#Text=Rebounding was also a huge factor , with Orlando winning that battle , 44 - 35 .
#Text=Memphis ( 20 - 13 ) have thrived off their dominant defense all season , but they simply did n't have it tonight .
#Text=Mike Conley had one of his best games since returning from injury though , as he tallied 17 points , twp rebounds and four assists .
#Text=The bench was one of the only bright spots , as Zach Randolph , Troy Daniels and James Ennis III all scored in double figures .
#Text=The Grizzlies will look to play better on Tuesday in a road matchup with the Boston Celtics .
#Text=Orlando ( 15 - 18 ) have really struggled on the offensive end this season , but they had one of their best games here against a stifling Grizzlies defense .
#Text=Aaron Gordon had one of the best games of his career , as he led the Magic with 30 points on 11 - of - 15 shooting .
#Text=Bismack Biyombo recorded a double - double in the win , totaling 10 points and 12 boards in just 23 minutes .
#Text=Elfrid Payton continued his great form off the bench , as he accumulated 16 points , four rebounds and seven assists .
#Text=The Magic will look to keep rolling on Wednesday in a home matchup against the Charlotte Hornets .
